Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE)

SUMMARY:  10-YEAR ONE-HALF (0.50) MILL PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF IMPROVING, OPERATING, MAINTAINING AND EQUIPPING THE MOREHOUSE PARISH EXTENSION OFFICE OF THE LSU AGRICULTURAL CENTER, INCLUDING SALARY SUPPORT AND THE COSTS OF PROGRAMS ADMINISTERED BY SAID OFFICE.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), acting under the authority of La. R.S. 3:301, and as a cooperative endeavor with the Louisiana Cooperative Extension Service of the Board of Supervisors of Louisiana State University and Agricultural and Mechanical College, levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of one-half of one (0.50) mill, on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of improving, operating, maintaining and equipping the Morehouse Parish Extension Office of the LSU Agricultural Center, including salary support and the costs of programs administered by said office?
